info.title: VTEX Tracking API version 1
info.description: REST API v1 of VTEX Tracking services. This API is only available in our Brazilian operation, for VTEX Tracking customers. The APIs are used for consulting and registering services in the VTEX Tracking system.

post.description: This endpoint permits the user to acquire the mandatory authentication to access the VTEX Tracking endpoints.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

get.description: Retrieves a list of services with pagination and urls. You can consult the list using the following filters: the service's registration date, status, page size, and desired number of pages. Check the parameters documented below, to see each filter's description.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Current status of the delivery service. The status parameters are not case sensitive, you can write them with upper or lower case. This field includes the following statuses as possible values: Ativo, Roteirizado, Realizado, EmAndamento, NaoRealizado

parameters.name: dateInit
parameters.description: Initial date of registration, of the requested service. The format is date-time.

parameters.name: dateEnd
parameters.description: End date of registration, of the requested service. The format is date-time.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items shown per consultation page. The default is 25

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The consultation's desired page

put.description: Removes Packing List on your VTEX Tracking configuration. Your request body must contain the invoice and serie fields.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

post.description: Creates a delivery service in your Tracking system. It allows the user to configure the Roteirização services, without defining the portador or route date.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

get.summary: Get Delivery Services List by Route
get.description: Retrieves a list of Delivery Services by Route Item Date Async

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Current status of the delivery service. Includes the following statuses as possible values: Ativo, Roteirizado, Realizado, EmAndamento, NaoRealizado

parameters.name: dateInit
parameters.description: Initial date of registration, of the requested service. The format is date-time.

parameters.name: dateEnd
parameters.description: End date of registration, of the requested service. The format is date-time.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items shown per consultation page. The default is 25

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The desired page for the consultation

Authorization.description: Header JWT Authorization header com Bearer scheme. Para utilizar os endpoints, faça login e copie o token para a caixa de texto abaixo com a tag Bearer. Exemplo: "Bearer {token}"
Authorization.name: Authorization
